trans-unit.source: Defines the properties and methods that must be implemented by any list control that repeats a list of items.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IRepeatInfoUser> interface defines the properties and methods that must be implemented by all list controls that repeats a list of items, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IRepeatInfoUser> interface define as propriedades e métodos que devem ser implementados por todos os controles de lista que se repete uma lista de itens, como <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>, e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>.

trans-unit.source: To indicate whether a list control contains a heading section, footer section, or separators, this interface defines the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IRepeatInfoUser.HasHeader%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IRepeatInfoUser.HasFooter%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IRepeatInfoUser.HasSeparators%2A> properties, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Para indicar se um controle de lista contém uma seção de cabeçalho, seção de rodapés ou separadores, essa interface define o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IRepeatInfoUser.HasHeader%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IRepeatInfoUser.HasFooter%2A>, e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IRepeatInfoUser.HasSeparators%2A> propriedades, respectivamente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IRepeatInfoUser.RepeatedItemCount%2A> property is used to represent the number of items in the list.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IRepeatInfoUser.RepeatedItemCount%2A> propriedade é usada para representar o número de itens na lista.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IRepeatInfoUser.GetItemStyle%2A> method to determine the style of an item in the list.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IRepeatInfoUser.GetItemStyle%2A> método para determinar o estilo de um item na lista.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IRepeatInfoUser.RenderItem%2A> method is used to display an item.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IRepeatInfoUser.RenderItem%2A> método é usado para exibir um item.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemType" /> enumeration values.
An ordinal index that specifies the location of the item in the list control.
Retrieves the style of the specified item type at the specified index in the list control.
A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> that represents the style of the specified item type at the specified index in the list control.

A list control that inherits from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IRepeatInfoUser> interface must implement the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IRepeatInfoUser.GetItemStyle%2A> method to retrieve the style of the specified item type at the specified index in the list control.
trans-unit.target: Um controle de lista que herda o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IRepeatInfoUser> deve implementar a interface a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IRepeatInfoUser.GetItemStyle%2A> método para recuperar o estilo do tipo especificado no índice especificado na lista de controle.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the list control contains a footer section.
<see langword="true" /> if the list control contains a footer section; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o controle de lista contém uma seção de rodapé de página; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: A list control that inherits from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IRepeatInfoUser> interface must implement the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IRepeatInfoUser.HasFooter%2A> property to indicate whether the list control contains a footer section.
trans-unit.target: Um controle de lista que herda o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IRepeatInfoUser> deve implementar a interface do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IRepeatInfoUser.HasFooter%2A> propriedade para indicar se o controle de lista contém uma seção de rodapé.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the list control contains a heading section.
<see langword="true" /> if the list control contains a heading section; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o controle de lista contém uma seção de cabeçalho; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: A list control that inherits from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IRepeatInfoUser> interface must implement the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IRepeatInfoUser.HasHeader%2A> property to indicate whether the list control contains a heading section.
trans-unit.target: Um controle de lista que herda o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IRepeatInfoUser> deve implementar a interface do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IRepeatInfoUser.HasHeader%2A> propriedade para indicar se o controle de lista contém uma seção de cabeçalho.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the list control contains a separator between items in the list.
<see langword="true" /> if the list control contains a separator; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o controle de lista contiver um separador; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: A list control that inherits from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IRepeatInfoUser> interface must implement the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IRepeatInfoUser.HasSeparators%2A> property to indicate whether the list control contains separators between items in the list.
trans-unit.target: Um controle de lista que herda o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IRepeatInfoUser> deve implementar a interface a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IRepeatInfoUser.HasSeparators%2A> propriedade para indicar se o controle de lista contém separadores entre itens na lista.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemType" /> enumeration values.
An ordinal index that specifies the location of the item in the list control.
A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatInfo" /> that represents the information used to render the item in the list.
A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> that represents the output stream to render HTML content on the client.
Renders an item in the list with the specified information.

A list control that inherits from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IRepeatInfoUser> interface must implement the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IRepeatInfoUser.RenderItem%2A> method to render an item in the list with the specified information.
trans-unit.target: Um controle de lista que herda o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IRepeatInfoUser> deve implementar a interface de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IRepeatInfoUser.RenderItem%2A> método para processar um item na lista com as informações especificadas.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of items in the list control.
The number of items in the list control.
trans-unit.target: O número de itens na lista de controle.

trans-unit.source: A list control that inherits from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IRepeatInfoUser> interface must implement the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IRepeatInfoUser.RepeatedItemCount%2A> property to indicate the number of items in the control.
trans-unit.target: Um controle de lista que herda o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IRepeatInfoUser> deve implementar a interface de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IRepeatInfoUser.RepeatedItemCount%2A> propriedade para indicar o número de itens no controle.
